verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H4150><s%> 'The set feasts of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations, <S%H4744><s%> even these are my set feasts. <S%H4150><s%>

<S%H8337><s%>"'Six days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done: <S%H6213><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of solemn rest, <S%H7677><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no kind of work. <S%H4399><s%> It is a Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in all your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>
<S%H4150><s%>"'These are the set feasts of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> even holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations, <S%H4744><s%> which you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> in their appointed season. <S%H4150><s%>
In the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day of the month in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s Passover. <S%H6453><s%>

On the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the same month <S%H2320><s%> is the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread. <S%H4682><s%>
In the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation. <S%H4744><s%> You shall do <S%H6213><s%> no regular <S%H5656><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>

But you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%> In the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation: <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no regular <S%H5656><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>'"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H935><s%> 'When you have come into the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> to you, <S%H7114><s%> and shall reap its the harvest, <S%H7105><s%> then you shall bring <S%H935><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> of the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of your harvest <S%H7105><s%> to the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

and he shall wave <S%H5130><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to be accepted <S%H7522><s%> for you. <S%H4283><s%> On the next day after the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave it. <S%H5130><s%>

On the day <S%H3117><s%> when you wave <S%H5130><s%> the sheaf, <S%H6016><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> a male lamb <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

The meal offering <S%H4503><s%> with it shall be two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts of an ephah <S%H6241><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma; <S%H7381><s%> and the drink offering <S%H5262><s%> with it shall be of wine, <S%H3196><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of a hin. <S%H1969><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> neither bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor roasted grain, <S%H7039><s%> nor fresh grain, <S%H7039><s%> until this same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you have brought <S%H935><s%> the offering <S%H7133><s%> of your God. <S%H430><s%> This is a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

<S%H5608><s%>"'You shall count from the next day <S%H4283><s%> after the Sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> from the day <S%H4283><s%> that you brought <S%H935><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> of the wave offering; <S%H8573><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> Sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> completed: <S%H8549><s%>

even to <S%H5704><s%> the next day <S%H4283><s%> after the seventh <S%H7637><s%> Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> you shall number <S%H5608><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> meal offering <S%H4503><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall bring out <S%H935><s%> of your habitations <S%H4186><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> loaves <S%H3899><s%> of bread for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering made of two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts of an ephah <S%H6241><s%> of fine flour. <S%H5560><s%> They shall be baked <S%H644><s%> with yeast, <S%H2557><s%> for first fruits <S%H1061><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall present <S%H7126><s%> with the bread <S%H3899><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H259><s%> one young <S%H1241><s%> bull, <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%> They shall be a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> with their meal offering, <S%H5930><s%> and their drink offerings, <S%H5930><s%> even an offering <S%H4503><s%> made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall offer <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> lambs. <S%H3532><s%> They shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

You shall make proclamation <S%H7121><s%> on the same <S%H6106><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> to you; <S%H6213><s%> you shall do no regular <S%H5656><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%> This is a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%> throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>

<S%H7114><s%>"'When you reap the harvest <S%H7105><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> you shall not wholly <S%H3615><s%> reap <S%H7114><s%> into the corners <S%H6285><s%> of your field, <S%H7704><s%> neither shall you gather <S%H3950><s%> the gleanings <S%H3951><s%> of your harvest: <S%H7105><s%> you shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them for the poor, <S%H6041><s%> and for the foreigner. <S%H1616><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>'"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7637><s%> 'In the seventh month, <S%H2320><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> shall be a solemn rest <S%H7677><s%> to you, <S%H2146><s%> a memorial of blowing <S%H8643><s%> of trumpets, <S%H6944><s%> a holy convocation. <S%H4744><s%>
You shall do <S%H6213><s%> no regular <S%H5656><s%> work; <S%H4399><s%> and you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>'"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"However <S%H389><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> is the day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement: <S%H3725><s%> it shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> to you, <S%H6031><s%> and you shall afflict yourselves; <S%H5315><s%> and you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall do <S%H6213><s%> no kind of work <S%H4399><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> for it is a day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement, <S%H3725><s%> to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
For whoever <S%H5315><s%> it is who shall not deny <S%H6031><s%> himself in that same <S%H6106><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%>

Whoever <S%H5315><s%> it is who does <S%H6213><s%> any kind of work <S%H4399><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that person <S%H5315><s%> I will destroy <S%H6><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>
You shall do <S%H6213><s%> no kind of work: <S%H4399><s%> it is a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

It shall be a Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of solemn rest <S%H7677><s%> for you, <S%H6031><s%> and you shall deny yourselves. <S%H5315><s%> In the ninth <S%H8672><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> from evening <S%H6153><s%> to evening, <S%H6153><s%> you shall keep <S%H7673><s%> your Sabbath. <S%H7676><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H2568><s%> 'On the fifteenth day <S%H3117><s%> of this seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> is the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tents <S%H5521><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation: <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no regular <S%H5656><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> On the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> to you; <S%H7126><s%> and you shall offer an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> It is a solemn assembly; <S%H6116><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no regular <S%H5656><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>

<S%H4150><s%>"'These are the appointed feasts of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations, <S%H4744><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and a meal offering, <S%H5930><s%> a sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> and drink offerings, <S%H4503><s%> each <S%H1697><s%> on its own <S%H3117><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%>

besides the Sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and besides your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> and besides all your vows, <S%H5088><s%> and besides all your freewill offerings, <S%H5071><s%> which you give <S%H5414><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H2568><s%>"'So on the fifteenth day <S%H3117><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> when you have gathered <S%H622><s%> in the fruits <S%H8393><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn rest, <S%H7677><s%> and on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn rest. <S%H7677><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of goodly <S%H1926><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> branches <S%H3709><s%> of palm <S%H8558><s%> trees, <S%H6057><s%> and boughs of thick <S%H5687><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> and willows <S%H6155><s%> of the brook; <S%H5158><s%> and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

You shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it a feast <S%H2282><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the year: <S%H8141><s%> it is a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations; <S%H1755><s%> you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>

You shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%> All who are native-born <S%H249><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths, <S%H5521><s%>

that your generations <S%H1755><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that I made the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths, <S%H5521><s%> when I brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>'"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> declared <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the appointed feasts <S%H4150><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
